extendedInfo.description: This simple application is designed to generate and read QR codes. To date supports the creation of codes in the format QR. The reader barcode formats supported UPC-A, UPC-E, EAN-8, EAN-13, CODE-39, CODE-128, ITF and QR code.When writing code, you can choose the type of encoded information:- Calendar Event;- Contact Information;- Email Address;- Geo Location;- Phone Number;- SMS;- Text;- URL;- Wifi Network.Additional features:- To save the generated code in the gallery;- The ability to transfer the generated code;- Change created or open source;- Sending the code to other applications.Read or the generated code can be sent by SMS or in any program that can receive graphic information.The program has a small size and hardware requirements of your Android device.
